title: Game-Based Mathematical Problem-Solving Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic operations, elementary algebraic concepts, and understanding of problem-solving strategies
context.additional_context: Project-based course for teenagers to apply advanced mathematical concepts through game-based learning in professional (medical/legal/technical) simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners can transform real-world problems into mathematical models through game-based missions
Learners can solve problems with over 80% accuracy by applying probability, statistics, and geometry concepts in medical/legal/technical simulations
Learners can document and present collaborative problem-solving processes for complex mathematical problems in team-based game projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
